# Discovering OpenSees -- Load Balancing for Large Parameter Studies, Oct 2013

This seminar will occur November 25 & 26, Nov 2013

Register for the seminar:

  • Nov 25, at 4:30 pm Pacific Time registration 1
  • Nov 26, at 9.30 am Pacific Time registration 2

This seminar will demonstrate how to improve the performance of parameter studies being run on high performance computers using load balancing techniques. It will be highly useful to any research group intending to do large parameter sweeeps.

The following topics will be discussed:

  • Introduction to Dynamic Load Balancing
  • Typical OpenSeesMP application script
  • Examples Scripts
  • Summary and conclusions
